content:
Hello!

Trying to find an open Fhir server DSTU2 that will support $match operation.

When trying sandboxes like https://api-v5-dstu2.hspconsortium.org or http://hapi.fhir.org/baseDstu2 getting an error:
"Invalid request: The FHIR endpoint on this server does not know how to handle POST operation[Patient/$match]".

Any advice?

Thanks
That operation was only defined in STU3, and not sure if anyone back ported it to DSTU2 in their servers.

Thanks a lot @Brian Postlethwaite

Should i be able to test it with any environment with DSTU3 or there is something specific to support Patient/$match ?

I have tried with DSTU3 sandbox: https://api-stu3.hspconsortium.org/STU301withSynthea/open
and getting the same error.
As for most FHIR capabilities, different servers will support different things. I think healthintersections.com.au supports it.
